attributes.action: Rename Credit Cards to Debt Cards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to introduce the compulsory renaming of 'Credit Cards' to 'Debt Cards' with the new name clearly visible on all cards. People should understand what they are getting themselves into. Just as with cigarette packets the "health" implications should be clear.
(Original idea credit to BBC Mischief)

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
